code: @Override public Instant parse(String text, Locale locale) throws ParseException {     if (text.length() > 0 && Character.isDigit(text.charAt(0))) {         // assuming UTC instant a la "2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z"         return Instant.parse(text).     } else {         // assuming RFC-1123 value a la "Tue, 3 Jun 2008 11:05:30 GMT"         return Instant.from(DateTimeFormatter.RFC_1123_DATE_TIME.parse(text)).     } }
@Override public String print(Instant object, Locale locale) {     return object.toString(). }
